net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.statistics

Class HibernateStatisticsCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.statistics.HibernateStatisticsCollector

  • @Configurable
public class HibernateStatisticsCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects statistics from HibernateStatisticsSessionListener for the current Request. An instance of this collector can be retrieved using HibernateStatisticsSessionListener.getStatisticsCollector().
    Since:
    4 /10/18
    Author:
    Alan Holt (aholt@proteus.co)

    • Nested Class Summary

      static java.lang.String PARAM_ENABLE_HIBERNATE_STATISTICS
      URL Parameter that can be used to turn on or off hibernate statistics
      static java.lang.String SESSION_HIBERNATE_STATISTICS
      Session key for storing a value to denote whether hibernate statistics should be shown
